responsibleGaming.title: Responsible Gaming - Responsible Gaming | Myanmar Casino Reviews
responsibleGaming.heading: Responsible Gaming
responsibleGaming.warningText: Gaming can be addictive and should only be for entertainment. If financial problems, psychological impacts, or family problems occur, you need to stop gaming.

section1.title: Healthy Gaming
section1.text: Gaming should be for entertainment only, not a way to make money.
section1.subtitle: You need to stop gaming if you have the following:
items: Borrowing money to play games when you don't have the money
Taking money from family or friends to play games
Neglecting work and family responsibilities due to gaming
Continuing to play games to recover losses

budget.title: Setting Budget
budget.text: Set the amount of money to play games in advance. Do not exceed the set amount.

time.title: Setting Time
time.text: Set time limits for playing games. Use a timer to manage time.

selfExclusion.title: Self-Exclusion
selfExclusion.text: If it is difficult to stop gaming, you can use Self-Exclusion Programs.

section3.title: Getting Help
section3.text: If you think you have a gaming addiction, you can contact the following organizations for help:

section4.title: 18+ Age
section4.text: You must be 18 years or older to use this website. People under 18 are not allowed to use this website.

section5.title: Tips
items: Do not play games while under the influence of alcohol or drugs
Do not play games to win
Avoid playing games during times of stress or depression

guideResponsibleGaming.title: Responsible Gaming | Responsible Gaming | Myanmar Casino Reviews
guideResponsibleGaming.description: Myanmar Casino Reviews promotes responsible gaming. Self-assessment, gaming limits, self-exclusion options.
guideResponsibleGaming.heading: Responsible Gaming
guideResponsibleGaming.whatIsText: Responsible gaming means using online casino for entertainment only while maintaining control over your budget and time. Myanmar Casino Reviews is committed to providing a safe and healthy gaming experience.
guideResponsibleGaming.selfAssessmentText: Ask yourself the following questions to assess your gaming habits.
selfAssessmentQuestions: Do you spend more than your budget on gaming?
Can you control your gaming time?
Do you sacrifice work and family time for gaming?
Do you borrow money to gamble?
guideResponsibleGaming.depositLimitText: Set daily, weekly, monthly deposit amounts
guideResponsibleGaming.selfExclusionText: If you feel you cannot control your gaming, you can use the self-exclusion option. With this option, you can close your account for 7 days, 30 days, 90 days, or 1 year.
guideResponsibleGaming.selfExclusionImportantText: After using the self-exclusion option, you can only reopen your account after the specified time has passed.
guideResponsibleGaming.gettingHelpText: If you feel you have a gambling problem, you can use the following methods to get help.
gettingHelpList: Myanmar Casino Reviews customer service: 24/7 help
guideResponsibleGaming.healthyGamingText: Use online casino for entertainment only and play responsibly
